articles.title: Bill with incentives for 'North American' electric vehicles passes in U.S. Senate - CBC News
articles.description: A bill that includes a key change to incentives around electric vehicles built in North America, rather than just the United States, has passed in the U.S. Senate.
articles.content:
The new plan to encourage Americans to buy more electric vehicles built in North America, instead of just the United States, has cleared its tallest hurdle.
After a marathon voting session that last… [+3522 chars]
